# Round 9 Donor-aware Reanalysis (Pseudobulk over donors)

Unit-of-inference update: donor-level aggregation of per-cell matched-null deltas.

- Donors represented: **3**
- Genes tested: **22**
- Nominal (t-test p<0.05): **4/22**
- FDR q<0.10: **0/22**
- FDR q<0.05: **0/22**

## Interpretation

- This directly addresses pseudoreplication by moving inference from cells to donors.
- If donor-level FDR significance remains absent/weak, claims should stay exploratory/set-level.
